item.title: SAMNIUM TECH is born!
item.description: Samnium Tech is born! This is the first blog post on SAMNIUM TECH. SAMNIUM TECH was founded with the mission of bringing to market the expertise accumulated through over a decade of experience in both hardware and software projects, particularly within the embedded field. Our goal extends beyond designing and selling innovative products; we are committed to providing specialized consulting services to assist companies in need. Our team excels in offering expert consulting in embedded Linux, as well as real-time operating systems such as FreeRTOS, NuttX, ZephyrOS, and others.
